original_title: Hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish Day 1
overview: hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish is a live concert held by Hololive Production on March 19-20, 2022 at Makuhari Messe Event Hall alongside Hololive Super Expo, featuring all members of Hololive 0th Generation, Hololive 1st Generation, Hololive 2nd Generation, Hololive Gamers, Hololive 3rd Generation, Hololive 4th Generation, Hololive 5th Generation, Hololive Indonesia 1st Generation, and Hololive English -Myth-.
tagline: hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish Day 1
title: hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish Day 1
